name: In re PETITION TO SUBMIT BALLOT QUESTION TO CONCORD TOWNSHIP VOTERS. Colette Brown, Petitioner. Dominic Pileggi, Kevin O'Donaghue, Robert Judge, Augustine Albino, Joseph Albino, Patricia Ausman, Christina Lambert, and Delaware County Board Of Elections, Respondents
name_abbreviation: In re Submit Ballot Question to Concord Township Voters

parties: In re PETITION TO SUBMIT BALLOT QUESTION TO CONCORD TOWNSHIP VOTERS. Colette Brown, Petitioner. Dominic Pileggi, Kevin O’Donaghue, Robert Judge, Augustine Albino, Joseph Albino, Patricia Ausman, Christina Lambert, and Delaware County Board Of Elections, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 6th day of October, 2015, Petitioner’s “Emergency Application for Extraordinary Relief1’ is hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
123 A.3d 775
In re PETITION TO SUBMIT BALLOT QUESTION TO CONCORD TOWNSHIP VOTERS. Colette Brown, Petitioner. Dominic Pileggi, Kevin O’Donaghue, Robert Judge, Augustine Albino, Joseph Albino, Patricia Ausman, Christina Lambert, and Delaware County Board Of Elections, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 6, 2015.
